Race.SpecificTitle: PW Fantasy Sports -- Authorize Fantasy Sports Contests - Act 322, 2018
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS.
Race.FullText: Shall fantasy sports contests be permitted in the parish of West Feliciana?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Communications Dist. -- 2 Mills Renewal - BOC - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the West Feliciana Parish Communications District (the "District") levy a two (2) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2023 (an estimated $575,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating an enhanced 911 telephone system (including the payment of necessary dispatch personnel)?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 1/2% S&U Tax Renewal - PC - 7 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District (an estimated $780,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of seven (7) years, commencing October 1, 2019, for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, supporting and/or operating recreational parks, facilities, equipment, programs and services, provided at the discretion of the District's governing authority, up to twenty-five percent (25%) of the annual proceeds of the Tax may be used for the purposes of maintaining and supporting social services and programs?
